snippet: After battling Britain’s courts to avoid deportation, a militant Islamist preacher said he will fly home to Jordan if a treaty regarding torture is ratified.
abstract: Militant Islamist cleric Omar Mahmoud Mohammed Othman says he will voluntarily fly home to Jordan if Britain and Jordan ratify a treaty that will ensure that no evidence obtained by torture will be used in terrorist bombing case.
lead_paragraph: After battling Britain’s courts to avoid deportation, a militant Islamist preacher said he will fly home to Jordan if a treaty regarding torture is ratified.

headline.seo: Militant Cleric May Head to Jordan
headline.main: Britain: Cleric May Head to Jordan
headline.print_headline: Britain: Cleric May Head to Jordan
